[Gnoll Weapon Expertise](/Feats.aspx?ID=2804) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 113 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Gnoll Weapon Practicality](/Feats.aspx?ID=2797)

</column>

---

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in a given weapon or weapons, you also gain that proficiency in [flails](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19), [khopeshes](/Weapons.aspx?ID=94), [mambeles](/Weapons.aspx?ID=96), [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10), and [war flails](/Weapons.aspx?ID=46).
